title: Blended Learning Design Utilizing VODcasts for Healthcare Professionals

context.prior_knowledge: Basic medical terminology and instructional design concepts comprehension
context.additional_context: Most learners primarily use smartphone environments and possess basic proficiency in real-time video conferencing platforms and mobile-based learning tools

learning_goals: Learners can explain at least three effective content organization strategies when producing VODcasts.
Learners can design and implement methods to integrate VODcasts with real-time activities in blended learning environments.
Learners can present at least five criteria for evaluating smartphone-based VODcast learning models in restricted technical environments.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
